name: jengaboot
description: Prototype that conforms to the magic-build spec. Implemented with Jenga.

scripts.compileUtils: ocamlfind ocamlc -pp refmt -linkpkg -package yojson -g -impl buildUtils/extractDeps.re -o buildUtils/extractDeps.out && ocamlfind ocamlc -pp refmt -linkpkg -package yojson -g -impl buildUtils/extractOcamlfindDeps.re -o buildUtils/extractOcamlfindDeps.out
